name: Centipede (itch) (Neil Farrier)
description:
My remake of a classic called centipede. In this game, you play as a hydra and pesky humans have stormed your castle.

Programming skills demonstrated in this game:

  • Events and delegates
  • Lists
  • Triggers, collisions and tags
  • Rigidbody velocity
  • Constraining movement to screen bounds
  • Instantiation
  • Procedural game object generation
  • Random ranges
  • Inputs
